text: Ekiam uan ingangarimɨn ganasava na mɨsefe, egha ingangarir kam damuasa gavgavim na ganɨngi. A ghaze, kɨ ian nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba, gavgavim dar anɨng, egh ia gasɨghasɨghan kogham, kamaghɨn a gavgavir kam na ganɨngi. Kɨ kamaghɨn aghua, kɨ ia bagh izɨva, egh gavgavir kam gisɨn, akar gavgavibar ia mɨkɨmɨva ian arazir kurabar kɨram. Kamaghɨn, kɨ saghon ikia, egha akɨnafarir kam ia bagha an osiri.
